definitions.body: deliverance, salvation = [[יְשׁוּעָה]] (formed by false anal., as if from √ [[שׁוע]], in sense of [[ישׁע]]; most assign it to [[שׁוע]], but no sufficient evidence for existence of such a √; cf. Kö:ii. 200)—abs. ´[[ת]] 1Sa 11:9 + 19 t.; cstr. Je 3:23 + 5 t.; sf. [[תְּשׁוּעָתִי]] Is 46:13 + 2 t.; [[תְּשׁוּעָֽתְְ]] Ps 40:11 + 2 t.; [[תְּשׁוּעָתְֶָ]] v:Ps 40:17, Ps 71:15; —

deliverance, usually by God, through human agency, esp. from oppression 1Sa 11:9, and in battle 1Ch 19:12 ([[הוֹשׁיע]] in ‖ cl.), = victory Ju Jdg 15:18 (´[[בְּיַד וגו]] ´[[נׇתַתָּ ת]]), 2Ki 5:1, ´[[י]] ´[[עשׂה ת]] 1Sa 11:13 ´[[י]] wrought a great victory, so 1Sa 19:5, 2Sa 19:3, 2Sa 23:10, 2Sa 23:12, 1Ch 11:14 (as acc. cogn. after [[הושׁיע]]), Pr 21:31, Ps 33:17 ([[נושׁע]] in ‖ v:Ps 33:16); [[למלכים]] ´[[הַגּוֹתֵן ת]] Ps 144:10; so in phr. [[ליהוה]] ´[[חֵץ־ת]] 2Ki 13:17, [[בַּאֲרָם]] ´[[חֵץ־ת]] v:2Ki 13:17; of national deliverance, from exile, [[עולמים]] ´[[נוֹשַׁע יִשְׂרָאֵל ת]] Is 45:17 (Da:Synt.:§ 67 b), Is 46:13 (‖[[חְדָקָה]]), v:Is 46:13 (c. [[נתן]]; ‖[[תִּפְאֶרֶת]]); in gen. of national success and prosperity Je 3:23, Pr 11:14 = Pr 24:6; of deliverance fr. personal trouble Ps 37:39, La 3:26 (´[[תְּשׁוּעַי י]]) or of national deliverance under fig. of personal Ps 40:11 (‖[[אֱמוּנׇֽתְְ]]), v:Ps 40:17, Ps 71:15 (‖[[חְדָקָח]]), so [[תְּשׁוּעָתִי]] Ps 38:22; contrasted with ´[[י]]'s deliverance is [[תְּשׁוּעַת אָדָם]] deliverance of (through) man Ps 60:13 = Ps 108:13, cf. Ps 146:3.

more exclusively spiritual in sense, = salvation, appear to be [[אֱלֽהֵי תְשׁוּעָתִי]] Ps 51:16, Ps 119:41 (‖[[חֲסָדְֶ]]), v:Ps 119:81, and ´[[כּׂהֲנֶי ְיִלְבְּשׁוּ ת]] 2Ch 6:41 (from [[כהניה אלברשׁ יֵשַׁע]] Ps 132:16).
